meanings.definition: Demanding too much attention or insisting too strongly on something.
meanings.sent1: The overinsistent child kept asking for candy even after being told no.
meanings.sent2: She became overinsistent about her need for a break from work.
meanings.sent3: The overinsistent puppy barked nonstop until it got a treat.
meanings.sent4: His overinsistent behavior towards his colleagues made them avoid him.
meanings.sent5: The overinsistent alarm clock woke him up every morning without fail.

meanings.definition: Excessively persistent or forceful in making a point or request.
meanings.sent1: The overinsistent salesman wouldn't take no for an answer.
meanings.sent2: She was overinsistent in her belief that she was right.
meanings.sent3: The overinsistent cat meowed loudly until it was fed.
meanings.sent4: His overinsistent arguments made everyone tired of listening to him.
meanings.sent5: The overinsistent storm pounded the coast with relentless fury.
